comments.author: anygregor@gmail.com
comments.creator: anygregor@gmail.com
comments.text:
There is still some finalizing going on during the raytracer v8 benchmark that adds to the main pause time (about 15ms). 
We should change the type of objects created in NewArguments to the background finalize type.
comments.raw_text:
There is still some finalizing going on during the raytracer v8 benchmark that adds to the main pause time (about 15ms). 
We should change the type of objects created in NewArguments to the background finalize type.
